title: I can sense a perm ban coming.
body:
I joked around about Kled and Naut being OP and went with it.

Realised too late that I was with a 3 man and a 4 man.

7 reports in one game. Ez.

replies.body: Report is just a flag, 1 report or 9 reports from a game do not change your likelihood of being banned. What's important is whether or not the report is valid or otherwise.

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=wbsgFipi,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-28T11:23:17.995+0000)
>
> Report is just a flag, 1 report or 9 reports from a game do not change your likelihood of being banned. What's important is whether or not the report is valid or otherwise.

But complaining about champs is considered to be negative as I've been punished for it before.

I can guarantee you that I'll be banned.

> [{quoted}](name=Broken Scripts,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=wbsgFipi,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-02-28T11:55:18.720+0000)
>
> But complaining about champs is considered to be negative as I've been punished for it before.
> 
> I can guarantee you that I'll be banned.

Complaining about champs shouldn't be the reason to why you were banned, it must be something else like how you got your points across, such as including not-so-pleasant remarks directed at the player themselves for example, but this is just an example to get to my points I'm not saying you must have done that.

Anyway, complaining about champs itself shouldn't get you banned, at least never a ban has come to me that way considering I can get riled up over being rekt myself as well.

This.

The reports will only count for something if you do something wrong, otherwise they're flagged as "invalid" and the reporters get their report weight dropped.
